skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: React.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap - Skilled in building responsive and interactive user interfaces.

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: Python, Django Rest Framework - Experienced in building scalable RESTful APIs and web services.

skills.title: Database & DevOps
skills.description: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis - Proficient in managing databases and deploying applications with Docker, Git, and AWS basics.

skills.title: Full-Stack Web Development
skills.description: Building and deploying full-stack applications using React.js for the front-end and Django Rest Framework for the back-end.

portfolio.title: Blogs
portfolio.description: A complete full-stack project built using React.js and Django Rest Framework, featuring user authentication and dynamic blog management.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce API
portfolio.description: Developed a comprehensive e-commerce API with Django Rest Framework, implementing product listings, cart functionality, and user authentication.

portfolio.title: Chat Application API using WebSockets
portfolio.description: Built a real-time chat application using WebSocket channels in Django Rest Framework, complete with JWT-based user authentication.

portfolio.title: Smart Todo App
portfolio.description: Developed a Smart Todo App leveraging AI integrations to prioritize tasks, suggest deadlines, and optimize workflows. Built with React for the frontend and Django Rest Framework for the backend, incorporating Open AI APIs for intelligent task management.

testimonial.description: This course covered a wide range of Python topics, from basics to advanced concepts, with hands-on projects that helped solidify my understanding of the language.
testimonial.author_name: Udemy Certificate in Python Beginner Course

testimonial.description: During my internship at an IT-based company, I gained valuable experience and contributed to several projects, giving my best effort in every task.
This course provided foundational knowledge in areas like MS Office and C programming, giving me a strong start in computer applications.
